vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for a commercial amusement (inside) on property zoned a CR Community Retail District, on the north line of West Camp Wisdom Road, between North Cockrell Hill Road and South Westmoreland Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z234-179(GB)
